amendment.description: To require a briefing on the assignment of members of the Armed Forces on active duty to the Joint Artificial Intelligence Center of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1977 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1977 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4187) To require a briefing on the assignment of members of the Armed Forces on active duty to the Joint Artificial Intelligence Center of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1977 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1977 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
